title: Nansen rolls out AI-powered trading solution on Solana and Base in a shift from pure analytics
snippet: Nansen has launched integrated AI-driven trading, enabling onchain execution across Solana and Base via its web and mobile apps.

title: Galaxy to launch $100M hedge fund to bet on rising and falling crypto prices
snippet: Galaxy plans to deploy a new hedge fund strategy that targets both crypto tokens and traditional financial stocks as the “up-only” phase fades.

title: Argentinian payments player Pomelo raises $55m
snippet: Argentinian payments infrastructure firm Pomelo is set to launch a native global stablecoin card after securing $55 million in a Series C funding round.

title: Noble blockchain shifts from Cosmos to launch its own EVM chain
snippet: Noble is seeking better developer access and a more robust tech stack to build its new EVM-compatible stablecoin-focused blockchain, which will launch in March.

title: Bhutan to deploy Sei validator in Q1, eyes tokenization collab
snippet: Bhutan is adding to its growing list of blockchain initiatives. It already runs a Bitcoin mining operation and also launched a self-sovereign ID system powered by Ethereum.

title: Chainlink launches 24/5 US equities data streams for tokenized stocks, ETFs
snippet: Crypto companies and traditional exchanges have been rushing to offer round-the-clock stock and ETF trading using blockchain-based technology.

title: RedStone acquires Security Token Market, TokenizeThis conference

title: US CFTC Chair Selig names crypto lawyer among new senior advisers
snippet: CFTC Chair Michael Selig named two senior advisers, including a crypto lawyer who helped draft a law firm's letter that led to an SEC no-action position on crypto custody.

title: Accelerating retail payments on Solana with BonkX and Solstice
snippet: The founders of Solstice and BonkX argue that stablecoins are DeFi's gateway drug, and lifestyle payments will onboard the next wave of users.

title: Ethereum DeFi Platform Makina Hit by Flash Loan Exploit, Loses $4M in ETH
snippet: The hacker used a flash loan to inflate prices on Makina’s USD-USDC liquidity pool, and then traded to make over $4 million.

title: Coinbase says capital access beats income in wealth creation
snippet: The policy paper argues that access to capital markets, rather than income or banking, now defines who can build wealth and says tokenization could widen participation.
